content:
IProgram IProgram Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.dll

Describes a program.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IProgramPublic Interface IProgram

Properties

ArchiveWindowLength ArchiveWindowLength

Edit

Gets or sets the archive window length.

TimeSpan ArchiveWindowLength { get; set; }Property ArchiveWindowLength As TimeSpan
Value
TimeSpan TimeSpan

Asset Asset

Edit

Gets the asset associated with the program.

IAsset Asset { get; }ReadOnly Property Asset As IAsset
Value
IAsset IAsset

AssetId AssetId

Edit

Gets or sets id of the asset for storing channel content.

string AssetId { get; set; }Property AssetId As String
Value
String String

Channel Channel

Edit

Gets the channel associated with the program.

IChannel Channel { get; }ReadOnly Property Channel As IChannel
Value
IChannel IChannel

ChannelId ChannelId

Edit

Gets id of the channel containing the program.

string ChannelId { get; }ReadOnly Property ChannelId As String
Value
String String

Created Created

Edit

Gets program creation date.

DateTime Created { get; }ReadOnly Property Created As Date
Value
DateTime DateTime

Description Description

Edit

Gets or sets description of the program.

string Description { get; set; }Property Description As String
Value
String String

Id Id

Edit

Gets Unique identifier of the program.

string Id { get; }ReadOnly Property Id As String
Value
String String

LastModified LastModified

Edit

Gets program last modification date.

DateTime LastModified { get; }ReadOnly Property LastModified As Date
Value
DateTime DateTime

ManifestName ManifestName

Edit

Gets the streaming manifest name. 

string ManifestName { get; }ReadOnly Property ManifestName As String
Value
String String

Name Name

Edit

Gets name of the program.

string Name { get; }ReadOnly Property Name As String
Value
String String

State State

Edit

Gets program state.

ProgramState State { get; }ReadOnly Property State As ProgramState
Value
ProgramState ProgramState
